Project Declaration:
Define product strategy for a real-time strategy game developer firm. Determine how to create an RTS game that continues to draw players for many years, leading to increased IP value and long term sales

Head of Product, TinyStrategyGameCo

Hypotheses: 
Focusing on creating a balance/fairness will reduce customer churn or increase usage of software (players will play more or keep playing due to having a fair and competitive game)
